video.title: Bloodline
video.synopsis: When the black sheep son of a respected family threatens to expose dark secrets from their past, sibling loyalties are put to the test.

episodes.synopsis: Trouble starts when oldest son Danny Rayburn comes home for the 45th anniversary celebration of his parents' hotel in the Florida Keys' Islamorada.
episodes.title: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: An accident exposes old wounds, complicating the already difficult situation between Danny and his family.
episodes.title: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: With Robert’s condition uncertain, Danny re-considers staying in Islamorada. Meg’s personal and professional obligations become overwhelming.
episodes.title: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The family adjusts to Danny’s new role at the inn.  John and Marco discover a burned boat connected to their murder case.
episodes.title: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: A sudden tragedy unsettles the Rayburn clan.  While searching for evidence in his case, John finds something disturbing from the family’s past.
episodes.title: Part 5

episodes.synopsis: John wants to keep Danny in the fold, but Danny learns an awful truth about the past. Meg takes on a new client. Kevin's personal life takes a turn.
episodes.title: Part 6

episodes.synopsis: John and Marco get a lead in their investigation. Meg does her best to help Carlos. Kevin comes clean with Danny.
episodes.title: Part 7

episodes.synopsis: Kevin recovers at Sally's house after he's robbed. Danny makes a deal with Carlos. John and Marco identify one of the murdered girls.
episodes.title: Part 8

episodes.synopsis: The DEA gets involved in John's murder case. Tensions rise between Meg and Danny. John digs into Danny's past. Sally reminisces.
episodes.title: Part 9

episodes.synopsis: As Meg and Sally move forward with the wedding plans, John and Marco's investigation points them in Danny's direction.
episodes.title: Part 10

episodes.synopsis: After John confronts Carlos about Danny’s illicit behavior, John, Kevin and Meg figure out a plan to save the family.
episodes.title: Part 11

episodes.synopsis: Danny’s past and present troubles become a threat to the Rayburns. Sally confronts her family.
episodes.title: Part 12

episodes.synopsis: John, Kevin and Meg try to get their lives back in order as the family comes to grips with the truth about Danny.
episodes.title: Part 13

episodes.synopsis: Meg learns her father kept a secret from the family for years. A voice from the past threatens John's plan to frame Wayne Lowry.
episodes.title: Part 14

episodes.synopsis: John decides to run for sheriff. While meeting with a business prospect, Kevin finds an unexpected moneymaking opportunity. Sally learns about Nolan.
episodes.title: Part 15

episodes.synopsis: Kevin's first transaction goes smoothly; his second is a disaster. John hunts for Eric in order to force Lowry to propose a plea deal to the police.
episodes.title: Part 16

episodes.synopsis: Kevin's actions loosen John's hold on Lowry. Sally gets a visitor from her past. John decides whether to help or hinder a bust on Lowry's operations.
episodes.title: Part 17

episodes.synopsis: Danny's old partner in crime in Miami is determined to make the Rayburns pay. Investor Roy Gilbert agrees to fund John's campaign, on one condition.
episodes.title: Part 18

episodes.synopsis: Eve reveals family secrets to Janey. Ozzy continues to provoke John. Meg finds a link between Aguirre's shady past and someone close to her.
episodes.title: Part 19

episodes.synopsis: At Aguirre's insistence, Marco questions Kevin and Meg about the time frame following the Red Reef Inn murder. Diana comes to a horrible realization.
episodes.title: Part 20

episodes.synopsis: Kevin finds a possible solution to his financial problems. Marco checks up on Meg's explanation for her suspicious behavior. Sally makes Eve an offer.
episodes.title: Part 21

episodes.synopsis: John finds evidence that refutes his alibi. Eric makes a remark that catches Marco's attention. Meg must decide whom to protect: Marco or her family.
episodes.title: Part 22

episodes.synopsis: Marco scrambles to get Eric immunity. Nolan recalls meeting Robert. Meg and Kevin turn against John, who pursues the one man who can alter his fate.
episodes.title: Part 23

episodes.synopsis: While fleeing the Keys, John hits a roadblock. In the wake of his confessional meeting with Marco, Kevin is forced to get help from a shady character.
episodes.title: Part 24

episodes.synopsis: Kevin finally reaches John on his phone. Eric calls Ozzy about an opportunity. Things go wrong while Kevin and Roy's man set up a plausible scenario.
episodes.title: Part 25

episodes.synopsis: Kevin's account of his injury gives Aguirre more questions than answers. Searching alone, John tries to find Eric before the police or Roy's men do.
episodes.title: Part 26

episodes.synopsis: Kevin and Belle become parents. John grows suspicious when Roy asks Kevin to sign a letter supporting Eric's petition to attend his mother's funeral.
episodes.title: Part 27

episodes.synopsis: While the Rayburns try to persuade the Diazes to accept a plea deal, Eric is advised to reconsider going to trial. Kevin falls in with a bad crowd.
episodes.title: Part 28

episodes.synopsis: On the day John testifies in court, he's visited by someone from his past. After catching John in a lie, Chelsea approaches the legal team with info.
episodes.title: Part 29

episodes.synopsis: Kevin takes the witness stand. John tracks down Meg. Sally agrees to testify against allegations that her family has a history of covering the truth.
episodes.title: Part 30

episodes.synopsis: Kevin finds himself in over his head with the Cubans. Sally makes plans for the future of the inn. John grows wary when a retired cop buddy visits.
episodes.title: Part 31

episodes.synopsis: A disoriented John finds himself in the hospital and proceeds to experience a series of surreal encounters that meld the past with the present.
episodes.title: Part 32

episodes.synopsis: Kevin learns one of the Cubans isn't who he claims to be. Sally gets devastating news. John faces what he must do to put the matter of Danny to rest.
episodes.title: Part 33
